text: Francesc Antich Oliver (; 28 November 1958 â€“ 2 January 2025) was a Venezuelan- born Spanish politician. He was the President of the Balearic Islands between 1999 and 2003, and 2007 and 2011. He also was the Secretary General of the Socialist Party of the Balearic Islands. Antich was born in Caracas, Venezuela. Antich died from cancer on 2 January 2025 in Mallorca, Spain at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Venezuelan politicians Category:Spanish politicians
title: Francesc Antich
